name: Bar Simulator
description:
Bar Simulator is the coolest new simulation game on the iOS App Store.
Receive a large inheritance of coins and start purchasing you favorite drinks at the bar, after enjoying a couple of drinks, build a wine collection, indulge in some of the world's best flavors.

Download Bar Simulator now and get started.

Developed by Mobile App Fund.
Get to know Mobile App Fund and Submit Your App Idea:
https://mobileappfund.com
